origination.label: Creator

did.abstract: ILGWU memorabilia including - buttons, name plates, clothing labels, plaques, awards and scrapbooks

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Joint Board, Fur, Leather & Machine Workers Union Memorabilia #5922 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5685: Joint Board, Fur, Leather & Machine Workers Union Records 5917 P: Joint Board, Fur, Leather & Machine Workers Union Additional Photographs 5685 P: Joint Board, Fur, Leather & Machine Workers Union Photographs 6214 MB: Herbert Turkel Collection of a Fur Worker's Flesher's Knife, Memorabilia 5922 AV: Joint Board, Fur, Leather & Machine Workers Union Audio-Visual Materials 5922: Joint Board, Fur, Leather & Machine Workers Union Additional records

Joint Board, Fur, Leather & Machine Workers Union

did.unittitle: International Fur & Leatherworkers of US and Canada, Leather Div., Canada (lapel pin)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: note included reads: Love is the thread, the common bond we all share. When stretched globally, the world will know peace.

did.unittitle: ILGWU buttons

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Local 64 buttons (1950-1954) ; some other misc. buttons (39 in total)

did.unittitle: Name Plate - Francois Felix, Fur Dressers & Dyers Division
Clothing Labels (roll) - Fur Labor Authority
Contribution Coupon booklets - Joint Board Fur, Leather & Machine Workers' Union for the election of Liberal, Pro-Labor Candidates in 1968
Paper Hats - FLM Joint Board
Job title-Photo caption labels
Plaque - 'Tribute to the Officers and Members Local 206-L' (1966)
Memorial plaque - Gertrude Shai
Contents of an unlabeled scrapbook

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1933-1938 - Fur Floor Workers' Union, Local No. 3 newspaper clippings about Leather Workers and NLRB

did.unittitle: Member stamp of International Executive Board, International Fur & Leather Workers' Union of United States & Canada

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Has pictures of members with their names on the stamp plate

did.unittitle: State of Israel - Anniversary Award - Furriers Joint Council - Plaque
International Fur and Leather Workers Union of US and Canada Charters And Amalgamated Meat Cutters and Butcher Workmen of North America, Certificate of Affiliation
Miscellaneous
International Fur and Leather Workers Union of United States & Canada Charters ; other misc.
Roll of Honor - Fancy Fur Dyers Union, Loc. 80 and Loc. 88 - Brittle
Plaques and Awards (9 total)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Amalgamated Meat cutters and Butcher Workmen ; Labor Press Council of Metropolitan New York ; FLM Tempo ; International Labor Press Association

did.unittitle: Plaques and Awards (10 in total)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Unlabeled photo mounted on a wooden back board ; Labor Press Council of Metropolitan New York ; International Labor Press Association ; Creed of the Butcher Workmen ; FLM Tempo ; FLM Joint Board Tempo

did.unittitle: International Fur Workers Union of United States & Canada Charters (2)
Scrapbooks / FLM Joint Board Tempo Covers mounted on boards

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Scrapbooks - Apparel Industries International Association Committee - 1948-1965 ; National Board of the Coat & Suit Industry - 1966 ; Executive Board Meeting National Board of the Coat… - 1967 ; Executive Board Meeting National Board of the Coat… 1966 ; Women's Wear Daily - 1943-1965 // Tempo covers - Oct. 1969 ; Feb. 1970 ; Aug-Sept. 1982 ; Feb. 1968 ; Dec. 1967
